document_data.name: Aileen
document_data.deathnotes: (slain by a [[Bloodriders|Bloodrider]] in [[Caer Corwell]]){{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|4722}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Aileen''' was one of the [[Sisters of Synnoria]], warriors of the [[Llewyrr]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3535}}
document_data.Description: When she went on scouting missions, Aileen covered her shining armor with a woolen [[tunic]] of green, earthen tones and changed her lance for a [[bow]], along with a slim [[sword]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3857}}
document_data.Relationships: As part of the Sisters of Synnoria, she fought under [[Brigit]]'s command and had [[Maura]] and [[Carina]] as companions. Her steed was called [[Osprey (horse)|Osprey]].
document_data.History:
Aileen took part in the battle of [[Corwell Road]], where she was wounded by one of the [[Bloodriders]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3872}} Although she was still affected by her wound, she served as a messenger in the defense of [[Caer Corwell]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|4648}}

Aileen was finally slain in the battle of Caer Corwell in [[1345 DR]] slain by the same rider that had wounded her before.
